comments.author: bayu7adi
comments.body: Yesterday, I wanted to participate in Utopia's raffle, but when I downloaded the Utopia software on my Android, I couldn't copy the deep link (chat link) because the feature might not be available yet. So, I thought of trying the desktop version.When I downloaded the desktop version, it turned out that it required a very long synchronization process. I could say that my internet speed was very slow, and I waited for 4 to 5 hours for the synchronization process to complete, but it never did. I gave up installing Utopia because there was no estimated time and data required for the application to be ready to use. I really hate playing guessing games.Can you guys share your experience with installing Utopia on a 64-bit Windows operating system? How long did it take to use the application? And approximately how much data was downloaded during the synchronization process?Thank you.

comments.author: joeperry
comments.body: Quote from: bayu7adi on May 05, 2023, 08:42:16 PM...Can you guys share your experience with installing Utopia on a 64-bit Windows operating system? How long did it take to use the application? And approximately how much data was downloaded during the synchronization process?Based on my personal experience (installing it to new device and synchronizing it) it doesn't take too long to sync, probably due to your internet connection but I'll make sure to send this concern to Utopia team.
